note.title: Kinship Interview
note.para: Do a kinship interview with a friend/peer. Collect information about their immediate family and relatives including information about marriage and descent, including deceased relatives and any prior marriages. Draw a kinship chart that graphically depicts the information that you collected through the interview. Ask your participant informer to critique your chart and then make any needed adjustments. Present the results of your project along with a reflection on the highlights of this work. What most challenged you and how did this work help you better understand your friend/peer? What interesting things did you learn about their life?
